body: No problem :-) From Spaces here is how it looks: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UNdbGkqHoSoAZKfDoVkOncE7vuCEBK5Epo4FIXCy7mgkpgcwwo74-l6xG5xeuclbUX1sIdPv3uwSsvVgXK3zss9Pj-yI1ILy/Capture.JPG)Biomet is just a post processing calculation (just as your LB_ThermalComfortIndices). After calculation a new directory is created (Biomet) and under it another set of directories are also created depending on the comfort model you asked for (PMV, PET and/or UTCI). Then you can open these calculations in Leonardo for visualization. -A.
